What is the highest mountain in the Neth: The Vaalserberg is the highest mountain in the Netherlands, although parts of the mountain belong to Belgium and Germany
Which painter created the Night Watch: It was created by the dutch painter Rembrandt
What is the largest lake in the Netherla: The largest lake in the Netherlands is the Ijsselmeer
When was Eindhoven first chartered: In 1232, by the duke of Brabant, Henry I
How many people live in Eindhoven: More than 200.000 people currently live in Eindhoven
What is the mascot for the 2024 RoboCup: The official mascot for this year's RoboCup is called Robin
How low is the lowest point in the Nethe: The lowest point of the Netherlands is -6.67m below sea level. It is located close to the A20
What was the dutch currency before the E: The guilder was the currency of the Netherlands before the euro was introduced in 2002
